CustomField.description: Running total of days from Census & Payroll Instructions to 1st Payroll. Stops Counting once 1st Payroll Date is verified.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c), 0-0,
(IF( Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c < Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c ,
(IF(ISNULL( X1st_Payroll_Date__c ), TODAY()- Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c, X1st_Payroll_Date__c - Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c)),
(IF(ISNULL( X1st_Payroll_Date__c ), MAX(TODAY()- Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c ,0), X1st_Payroll_Date__c - Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c )) )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Running total of days from Census & Payroll Instructions to 1st Payroll. Stops Counting once 1st Payroll Date is verified.
CustomField.label: Time to 1st Payroll KPI
